New Records: Mitchell Marsh scored 177 not out, the highest score in the match
Australia recorded their seventh straight win in the World Cup group stage
Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh and Steve Smith's partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins praised Mitchell Marsh's innings
Najmul Hossain Shanto reflected on Bangladesh's performance and areas for improvement
Mitchell Marsh expressed his gratitude and looked ahead to the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's net run rate and qualification for the Champions Trophy
